name: Failed registration due to existing username
scenarioId: user_registration/UserRegistration:Failed registration due to existing username
methodName: Failed registration due to existing username

testSteps.description: Given that the customer navigates to the Advantage Online Shopping homepage

children.description: Cliente opens the browser at https://advantageonlineshopping.com/

testSteps.description: When he tries to register using an already registered username

children.description: Cliente clicks on user menu icon
Cliente clicks on create new account link
